Per the [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/ath9k/devices '''ath9k''' device list], the PCI ID of this device is 168c:0023 (168c:2079). ==Links of Interest== [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=24580 00:27:19 ('''TP-LINK''') OUI]
